item.title: Woman in China, 45, made S$589,800 by buying insurance on flights she predicted would get delayed
item.description: To avoid getting caught, she used over 20 other identities to take out the insurance.
item.author: (In short: men will have to pay more.)

item.title: DeepFakes used in Animations - A New Way of Animating?
item.description:
I used First Order Motion Model for Image Animation, which is similar to DeepFake AIs, but it can do more like tracking motions and copying them onto another target. I feel like this can make creating anything for anime, games, or films a lot easier. The easier is to do something, the overall standard will increase. Looking forward to a lot of good games, movies and anime in the future!
Join my Discord https://discord.gg/NhJZGtH
My Twitter https://twitter.com/ytcloud_
First Order Motion Model for Image Animation https://papers.nips.cc/paper/8935-first-order-motion-model-for-image-animation
Two Minute Papers on First Order Motion Model for Image Animation https://youtu.be/mUfJOQKdtAk
Colab for First Order Motion Model for Image Animation https://colab.research.google.com/github/tg-bomze/Face-Image-Motion-Model/blob/master/Face_Image_Motion_Model_(Photo_2_Video)_Eng.ipynb
credits: DeepFake - Back to the Future https://youtu.be/8OJnkJqkyio
DeepFake - Tom Cruise for President https://youtu.be/5Btb8gLy3-E
music Steaminwaffles - Wait
Background Art https://twitter.com/bynicalcynical
